creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: three men, one with a knotty cane, stand under a tree near a rock conversing and gesturing

Inscription and Stamp

Line of Japanese characters in black ink in TLQ at edge

title: Three Laughers of Tiger Ravine
